gpt_select_functions_reason: Selected Firming Agent because the document states the product forms gels in cold water and milk when combined with calcium, indicating a firming function. No other functions are mentioned or implied in the document.

gpt_gen_product_description: CEAMTEX 1602 C is a white to beige powder alginate product derived from brown seaweeds, designed for water-based applications. It dissolves in both cold and hot water and forms gels when combined with calcium sources. This natural hydrocolloid offers consistent performance, is easy to use, and is ideal for creating stable gels in food and beverage formulations.
